title: Sword Of The Stars The Pit Gold Edition (Update 2 Patch) (GOG)
description:
Guys, this is the update 2 patch for the gog version of SOTP Gold edition.
This does not include the SOTP gold edition game. This is  only the update patch.
If you want SOTS gold edition gog, click the link below
  <a href="
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/9170951/Sword_Of_The_Stars_The_Pit_Gold_Edition_(GOG)" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/9170951/Sword_Of_The_Stars_The_Pit_Gold_Edition_(GOG)</a>


Update 2 Patch Notes (Patch 1.2.2

- Floor 40 no longer results in a crash for some players. 
NOTE: Fix may cause minor lag on some machines, but only maybe and only 
for some. 
- TK Fist no longer uses melee skill, proper uses telekinesis skill. 
- Certain achievements are now properly displayed during Game Over. 
- Creation Station now properly cooks meat. 
- Manipulation can now be used to reprogram Recycler. 
- Ayma now functions as intended. 
- Certain items' effect on the MaxFoodRating now working properly. 
- Pulse resonator no longer blocks movement while it pulses. 
- Added "Racial Penalty" display for weapons from another species.
